name: Judon Burwin
text: As a New Yorker, I am very fussy about my pizza. I like good sauce and cheese. That’s the true test of a great tasting pie. Blaze nailed it. Great thin crust, well baked. Delicious sauce and a creamy, excellent cheese. Any other toppings start with the right foundation. Highly recommend.

name: Savannah McClelland
text: Blaze you saved the end of my busy week! First time trying [w/Postmates to help a brother out] and the service, delivery, and food was spectacular <3 👌👍 I got my food quickly and my toddler can't get enough!  Great job on your White Top …More

name: Earl Straw
text: We always get great pizza here, and takes just a few minutes.

name: John Buckley
text: I like to have my pizza custom made. My wife gets a gluten free pizza with non dairy cheese. I like to try different toppings and sauces.

name: chrisjoe015
text: First time trying this pizza place and it sure won't be the last. Great price for a build your own pizza with your choice of any toppings to fill you up. Environment was chill and mellow to dine in alone or with a friend. Pizza is filling and flavorful, prepped and cooked within minutes.

name: KINGJADEX
text: Beyond awesome! A series of mishaps happened that I won't really go into, but Adrian, the manager, was awesome. He was exemplary in resolving the situation. Thank you very much!

name: Fusion Hotline
text: Place is great! Always clean and pretty quick. Beer was poured great and pizza was amazing. Price is pretty good for what you get.

name: Robert F. Sanders
text: Love the curbside take-out!  I live with immunocompromised family, so it's great to eat pizza again. …More

name: Skyler Puckett
text: Blaze Pizza offers delicious individual thin crust pizzas baked in a wood-fired over for around $7.65. They offer a set menu; however, it's more fun to select from numerous fresh toppings for your pizza including standards such as …More

name: Marck Jimenez
text: As one of the worlds biggest pizza fan i approve this place. Some of the most amazing pizza you can have locally. I recommend this pizza place to any other pizza lovers out there like myself.

name: Chad Hobson
text: Definitely a decent pizza and the topping choices are excellent, but the crust is what makes or breaks a pizza. These pizzas are New York style. The crust has char, which is okay, but should also have a bit of snap and crisp to it. Char and floppy is not good. I'm guessing the oven is too hot or lacking convection.

name: Pocket C.
text: Blaze Pizza, even at its busiest, does not skimp on food or customer service. When it is crowded, it is still a quick process in ordering and receiving pizza. The staff always ask if they can take your trash, if you need anything, and are …More

text:
Ordered a signature pizza for pick up yesterday
Supervisor Jesus walked me through the ordered
He could not be more helpful....our experience was excellence
Hot and delicious...we will be back🍕

text: First time there. Great food! Did the build your own. Best decision ever.

text: I can get a better pizza ,they are so cheap on putting cheese and anything else , never again

name: Bethany Hayes
text: Love this place! Staff are very nice and professional. They handle the food correctly. I love how you are asked if you have allergies so they can change gloves and handle your food appropriately. Food is ALWAYS FRESH. This place is ALWAYS …More

name: Sweet-E
text: Fresh ingredients, great prices, and gluten free crust! I LOVE Blaze Pizza, by far my favorite. Sometimes they get really stingy on the toppings, but today they were generous with prompting. We drive 15 min to eat here and happy to make the drive.

name: Carmen Castillo
text: One of the best pizzas I've had, without feeling overstuffed. Love the selection of fountain drinks, favorite would have to be the pomegranate lemonade.

name: Harry Wood
text: Bleh.  Only gave it 2 stars becuz it was a fun location and have outdoor seating options.   Pizza is thin - if u like it that way, you’ll be fine.  I was still hungry after eating. And I didn’t think the pizza was all that good.

text: My first visit and my last. The young lady that greeted us was rude.  The rest of the front line....didn't want to be there. The customers were an "inconvenience".

My finished pizza tasted spicy, which I hate, all because they was accidental jalapenos on my pizza. I will not eat at this location again.

name: Brian Bauer
text: New employees can be had to communicate with but other than that they are great every time. Wish the prices hadn't gone up.
